title.value: US Public Health Message Type Codes

description.value: The US Public Health Message Header Events CodeSystem is a 'starter set' of codes supported for identifying types of messages being exchanged.

display.value: Indicates a message containing a report exchanged between clinical care and PHA/Research Organization.

definition.value: Indicates a message that contains data for a specific use case. Hep C, Cancer and Healthcare Surveys are example use cases etc.

display.value: Indicates a message containing cancer reporting data sent from clinical care to PHA.

definition.value: Indicates that cancer data are present in the message being sent from clinical care to PHA.

display.value: Indicates a message containing cancer report response data sent from PHA to clinical care.

definition.value: Indicates that a message containing response data for an already submitted cancer report is being sent from PHA to clinical care.

display.value: Indicates a message containing Hep C data sent from clinical care to PHA.

definition.value: Indicates that Hep C data are present in the message being sent from clinical care to PHA.

display.value: Hep C Response Message sent from PHA to clinical care.

definition.value: Indicates that a message containing response data for an already submitted Hep C report message is being sent from PHA to clinical care.

display.value: Indicates a message containing healthcare survey data sent from clinical care to PHA.

definition.value: Indicates that healthcare survey data are present in the message being sent from clinical care to PHA.

display.value: Indicates a message containing healthcare survey data sent from PHA to clinical care.

definition.value: Indicates that healthcare survey data are present in the response being sent from PHA to clinical care in response to a healthcare survey report message.

display.value: Indicates a message containing healthcare data sent from clinical care to Research Organization.

definition.value: Indicates that research data are present in the message being sent from clinical care to Research Organization.

display.value: Indicates a message containing response data from Research Organization to clinical care.

definition.value: Indicates that research data are present in the response being sent from Research Organization to clinical care in response to a submitted research report message.
